transcript:
Customer: Kaushalya Dashrath ke Nandan Ram Lala pe shobhit Chandan Raghupati ki Jai bole Lakshman Ram Siya ka ho abhinandan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Swagat hai main Priya bol rahi hun IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan boliye boliye mam.
Customer: Haan ji sir actually na mere manager aapse baat karna chahte hain.
Customer: To agar aap ji agar aap aise wo online mobile aap isko link join kar lenge to wo bhi aa jayenge usi same link pe.
Customer: Chahe mobile se.
Executive: Kis ke regarding baat karna hai mam?
Executive: Sir yahi jo aapki services se issue aa raha hai na uske hi regarding.
Customer: Nahi first to mujhe wo ek clear kar dijiye ki jo humne wo change karne ko bole the keyword wo huye ki nahi huye.
Executive: Haan usme se main aapko bata deti hun jo aapne change karne ko keyword bole the usme se ek ho gaya hai aur dusra main batati hun kaun sa ho gaya hai ek second sir aap on call rahiye.
Executive: Wo jo change karne ko aapne bola tha just a second.
Executive: Haan jo aapne bola tha usme 3D floor tile jo hai wo change ho gaya hai aur jo sirf floor tile
Executive: Jo hai na isko option nahi aa raha tha hamare end pe.
Executive: To kyunki wo aap change kar payenge aapka system se maine us din bola jitna hamare end se possible tha na change ho paya floor tiles wala uske alava jo hai wo kuch aapke end se possible hai maine us din bhi aapko bola tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan to boliye main waise kar deta hun pehle to.
Executive: Aap hai system pe?
Customer: Haan system pe hi hun boliye kya karna hai.
Executive: Setting me jana hai.
Executive: Sir setting me nahi jana hai sir aapko product wale section me jana hai maine aapko even video meeting ka link bhi share kar diya hua hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapko jana hai sir product section me gaya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Waha pe jo dekhiye right side me more options likha hai.
Customer: Ek minute ha.
Executive: Haan ha.
Customer: To ha more option okay.
Executive: Haan waha pe product categories pe click kariye.
Customer: Third wala hai na ha.
Executive: Ab dekhiye aapko sari aapki paid services dikhi hai ye leader wala jo pehla dikh raha hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan ye sir I am start then preferred sir preferred leader I am an industry leader test.
Customer: Mam mam one second okay.
Customer: Leader leader me kaun sa sab alag alag promote ho rahe hai right?
Executive: Main batati hun jo ye right side me likha hai na wo available categories ye hai man lijiye aapko koi change karna hai aur jo selected city combination jo aapne select kiya hai wo ye hai man lijiye aapko wo change karna hai to wo left side wale se aap select karke usko move kar sakte hain.
Customer: Main maine aapko.
Customer: Wo abhi hamare paas available nahi hai wo abhi nahi hai hamare paas aisa hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir isliye maine aapko video meeting ka link share kiya tha main batati hun aapko jo ye right side me hai na selected city category combination jaise pehla likha hai floor tiles.
Customer: Wo mera chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan wo chal raha hai aur available categories jo likha hai wo ye hai just imagine aapko ye floor tiles Mumbai se hatana hai to aap isko cross karenge aur jo available category waha pe aapko dikh raha hai man lijiye aapko vitrified
Executive: Filed floor tiles Bangaluru se karna hai to aapne isme 182 products add kiye hain jo aapki preferred bhi hai kyunki aap isko consume karte ho isme se aapne pichle che mahine me 25 buylead bhi consume kiye hain to agar aap isko karate hain to ye wali category aapki is city me promote hogi move kar sakte hain hum isko.
Customer: Haan ek minute main kar hi leta hun abhi maine remove kiya ha remove kiya lekin abhi add hone ka koi wo dikha nahi de raha.
Customer: Select nahi ho raha mam sorry.
Executive: Sir ek bar aap video meeting join karenge maine link share kiya hua hai main bata du aapko aapki mail id jo hai just a second.
Customer: WhatsApp pe bhej dijiye na kuch hai to main login karne me bahut time lagega.
Executive: WhatsApp pe main kya aapko share karti hun wo link share kar deti hun na main.
Customer: Ye mere wo personal id me kar do wo bhi login hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye main aapko bhej rahi hun just a second.
Executive: Aapka WhatsApp.
Executive: Haan ji aap dekhiye maine aapko meeting ka link share kiya hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ek minute WhatsApp pe.
Executive: Sir wo link pe click ho raha hai?
Customer: Ye ask to join karna hai na.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji ask to join pe click kariye.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Aap jis vyakti ne call karyo chhe tene tamaro call hold par rakhyo chhe kripa kari line par raho aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold.
Customer: Ye to phone band ho ja raha hai mam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ye phone hold ho ja raha hai isme se seedha.
Executive: To us wo main samajh rahi hun hold ho ja raha hai lekin agar aap us pe wo karenge na waha se mic on karenge to ye call cut ho jayega us pe aawaz aayegi.
Customer: One second.
Executive: Haan ji aap kariye usko.
Customer: Ho gaya.
Executive: Haan ji sir ho gaya.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan to phone cut kar dijiye na.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to change keywords.

- Facing issues with adding new categories.



Resolution:

- One keyword change was confirmed.

- Executive shared a video meeting link for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meeting.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, category, video meeting, product section
